Hero.description: Cybersecurity specialists offering advanced pentest, threat intelligence, and strategic consulting solutions for companies that take security seriously.

Services.description: We offer a comprehensive portfolio of specialized services to protect your organization against the most sophisticated threats.
Services.advanced_pentest_description: Complete penetration tests with OWASP and NIST methodologies, including code and infrastructure analysis.
Services.threat_intelligence_description: Real-time threat intelligence with 24/7 monitoring and predictive risk analysis.
Services.devsecops_description: Integration of security into the development cycle with automation and secure code practices.
Services.specialized_training_description: Advanced technical training for IT and development teams with recognized certifications.
Services.and_much_more_description: We offer additional services such as SOC structuring and compliance consulting. Contact us for customized solutions.
Services.know_services: I want to know the services

About.description: We are a team of certified cybersecurity specialists, with over a decade of experience protecting organizations against advanced digital threats.
About.certifications: CISSP, CEH, OSCP, and ISO 27001 Certifications
About.incident_response: Incident response in less than 15 minutes
